attributes.additional_details: I know of patients travelling daily to Birmingham from Brecon to revive cancer treatment. We are the only county in the UK with no big hospital why? We are also the largest council area in the UK. Please support this petition to get local cancer services for local communities.
attributes.background: I have Prostate Cancer. I'm having my Radiotherapy in Cheltnham and Hereford. The NHS are going to fund transport everyday. What a waste of money ferrying patients all over England!

rejection.details:
The NHS in Wales is the responsibility of the Welsh Government. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into this issue. 

The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:

http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
